JQuery DataTable Column Filter - Number Range Filters

Preamble

DataTables Column Filter add-on enables you to add number range filters where you can filter columns by the min and max values.

Live example

Initialization code

In the initialization code you should place "number-range" as type of the column filter as shown below:

	
$('#example').dataTable().columnFilter({ sPlaceHolder: "head:after",
                                                             aoColumns: [
                                                                         { type: "number-range" },
                                                                         { type: "text" },
                                                                         { type: "number-range" }
                                                                         ]
                });

In ths example fiter row injected in the second row of the THEAD section of the table so you will need to manually place this duplicate row.
